content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't find my intial post which had a wrong event date.
viewing this photograph found at link indicated within the photograph
my attention was drawn to some people in the crowd. their attention should have been drawn to the prince and duchess but some seem to be taking photos/filming obviously away, not a normal behavior considering they are there to see the prince and duchess.  what are they looking up at?  zooming in the sky within the photograph i noted anomalies.  

the darker of the three seem disc shape but at that distance what could it really be? the problem i have with a plane is i doubt any would be permitted to fly during the horse drawn carriage procession. 

could these be birds?   i noted other anomalies that would suggest birds but these three anomalies have my interest to have mufon investigators further investigate film footage of the event at this location to identify what these are.
content.summary: Royal wedding crashers?  anomalies in the sky near the procession route

content.detailedDescription: My father had just passed away that night at the uniontown hospital, and i was traveling with my companion back to my home, and my brother and his wife were following us in their car, when we all slowed down to watch a hugh bright object hovering above the mountains, we saw a beam of blue light shine down through the trees,and an object of somekind was lifted up by the beam to the ufo? we were all amased by what we were seeing? then the hugh ufo speeded away, and was gone in a flash? we don't know what it was, but we know it wasn't a plane, or man made aircraft, it had to be 200 yards long, and about 2 stories high?  i've never seen anything like that before that big? i have however seen several ufo's throuhjout my life going back to my childhood? my most recent experience was inside my bedroom last november 2010 when i was awoken by a greenish-blue bright light at the foot of my bed? i couldn't move, except for my eyes? i was terrified, i felt like something was holding me down, and i could see small shadows in the dreenish-blue light? this lasted about a half hour it seemed? the light vanished, and i was then able to move again?         i can remember small beings coming into my room when i was about 5 years old, and screaming uncontrolably!?   i have several other cases i would like to share with you. i'm looking forward to hearing from mufon? thank you, sincerely; *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Giant disc/triangle ufo hovering over top the nearby mountains

content.detailedDescription:
i stopped on a country road to bs a guy who sits and drinks out there. while talking to him i noticed a bright white light moving easterly approximately over the toutle or green river south of my location near the cowlitz river.
the light proceeded east at a leisurely pace for a little while for a (maybe 20 or 30 second)it then made a slow-sweeping right hand turn to the south and then proceeded south. it went behind a cloud bank and never came out the other side. it may have stopped, making it indistinguishable from a star as they sometimes do.
 it was nothing spectacular but it's the first one ive seen in a while.
i just like to share this stuff when i see it. 
 approximate altitude would be stratosphere, way up on the edge of space.
just one of those lights that bebops around up there.
content.summary: White light-high flyer

content.detailedDescription:
I posted three pictures and did not get the one i wanted to show most of all

picture #621- it shows what looks like a structure and red and white lights around the outside of the main light
if you magnify most of these pictures you can see the small red and white lights
content.summary: Star going straight up into space

content.detailedDescription: I have been told that this has explainable activity but i can't figure out what.  airplanes don't silently go over my head silently and they sure don't move in one direction stop and do another all silently.  i have seen hundreds around my town...Please come investigate yourself if you are interested in the scientific process you won't ignore this.
content.summary: Please explain to me the activity in this video

content.detailedDescription: In 1969 while on night manuvers at fort gordon ga. i and three others looked up in the shy to see three football shaped objects hovering in the sky over us. being dark, it was difficult to determine their altitude. they had lights around their perimeters and were soundless. we were staring and wondering what they were when in formation they began to move away again soundless and as we watched they accellerated within seconds into pin sized spots of light again without any sound. all 4 of us saw this and were obviously amazed by what we saw. it happened for sure just as described.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 football sized ojects hover then accellerate a a fantastic rate into space with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: It was a monday morning january 29th 2011, i was working. i do music so i was trying to get some footage of downtown. i got a couple of scenes but later when i went back to look at the film i was trying to see what was this glare or whatever it was come from. i didnt see it with my naked eye at the time. the object seemed to be following us and hid behind first tennessee building in one of my clips. its not a fake i tell you.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Square,   Rectagular
content.summary: I was filming and caught this object in my footage not knowing what or how it got in my footage.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday april 30, 2011. approximately 1-1:30 pm. 
it was partly cloudy, with the sun shining, and it was windy. my youngest daughter and i were flying her kite on the fairmont soccer fields, it is flat there, no obstructions, and we had it to ourselves.
i was looking up at the kite while my daughter was flying it, and then i saw 6 round objects in a "v" formation heading from south to north. at first i thought they were geese and i kept telling myself they were. but as they flew above us they were spherical. they sort of looked like stars. and judging by distance they were probably the size of a fighter jet. 
i was screaming to my daughter to ask her if she could see them. she couldn't at first.
"that cloud?" she asked.
"no, above it!" i answered.
"what the---!" 
just before she said that they dispersed in an erratic pattern. they moved like nothing i had ever seen before. then, one by one they disappeared into the cloud they were near.
i tried to take a photo of it with my phone but it does not take good photos of far away objects.
i tried to look to see if there were more of them, but there wasn't that i could see.
i felt and still feel uneasy about the entire thing. i felt a little releif when i saw on the internet sightings of the exact same things all over the world. but i don't think will ever look up at the sky for a long time, and i am very nervous about flying in a plane this summer for our family vacation.
content.summary: Daytime sighting ufo's in a v formation.

content.detailedDescription:
i was out with a friend at some property his family owns about 1.5 miles west of the race track on beeline, i believe its considered martin county i could be wrong. it had to have been about 11-12 pm or so based on a picture i took well prior to it and a text i sent soon after.It was a clear clear night, i was facing east my friend west as we spoke about the planed morning hunt when i bursted out with "you just missed a shooting star", he turns and again the light flashes across the sky heading south, he replied, "wow another one".I was stunned. for a second i thought metior shower but no, not at all.
 its so hard to explain, im facing east, the flash was in my vision about 65-70 degrees in my line of sight and could not have been higher than 10 thousand feet and vanishes, a split second later as my friend turns it flashes again this time about 10 degrees lower in my sight and vanishes, and again still heading south with each flash covering vast sectiions of sky it flashes again this time about 10degrees above my initial 65-70 degrees. this is all happening in flashes of a bright white light a second or less apart, my friend claims he cought a orange glow to it but i cant confirm. by now it had traveled south far just above the tree line.It then flashes west a short distance then east then west again each time about 10 degrees in my line of sight and every time the same distance and it was gone. minutes later maybe 15 or so i seen it again this time far east if i had to guess i would say either close or past our shore. far enough to be low in the horizon.This time i only seen two flashes of light, the first heading south the second north about half the distance it travelled south also at a higher altitude and gone again without a trace.My friend was answering natures call, either way it happened so fast by the time i said "there it is again" it was over. 
 its important you know i am a aircraft mechanic and love aviation while i cant name every aircraft i know a plane from anything else. i heard zero sound, zero sound at that altitude from something moving that fast changing dirrection so radically. in between flashes of light it was out of sight each time for a split second and re-appear above or below its previous path. i cant explain it much better and before i confuse my self thinking about it i wanted to write it down and hear opinion and comments. i know what i seen and glad i wasnt alone because i wouldnt believe it if i heard it.
content.summary: Fast flashes changing alt and dirrection

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:45pm we were standing outside while some people were enjoying the calm, but cool evening on the deck.  someone said "what is that?" and we looked up and saw an extremely bright object that looked like a satellite cruising.  however, this was much brighter then any satellite we have seen, not to mention we were in the middle of the city where satellites are rarely if ever seen.  

the object was at a high altitude, i would guess in between normal commercial air traffic and satellite altitude. the direction it was heading was to the south east.  the light was about the size of a dime from our perspective, huge!  it crossed the sky fairly quickly and as it quickly crossed the sky it looked as if it had started to climb rapidly until the light which was in clear view eventually vanished in the sky, there was nothing to get in the way of our view. 

we all were confused, none of us (3 total) could explain what it was.  we are used to air traffic from pdx and this was nothing even close to any jet we had ever seen.  when it seemed get dimmer and dimmer as if it was climbing straight up the object was no longer visible and i have never seen a jet do that, nor have a seen a plane glow like this object had been glowing.  

when i say it was bright, it was very very bright.
content.summary: Extremely bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on 18th street in lafayette about two blocks north of jefferson high school. in a brief glance to the east i observed a white star-like object leave a cloud formation and travel for about 3 seconds to another cloud formation and disappear. no tail was observed. the object's size at arm's length was between 1/16 and 1/8th of an inch in diameter. it traveled in a northeastern direction. at the same time there was a single engine prop plane traveling south below the object in question. i estimate the angle observed above the horizon to be approximately 50 degrees.

i thought the object could be a meteor, but it did not travel at a steep angle nor did it have a tail or fade gradually. it was one of those experiences that cause you to catch your breath momentarily. intuitively there was something different about the object.
content.summary: Observed white star-like object leave a cloud formation to the east and travel a distance in @ 3 sec. to another cloud formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my truck talking on my cellphone to my girl friend when i looked out to my left and noticed an extremly bright light coming from the woods, then i realized after watching for a few seconds that it was airborne and was moving toward my position. the light flew quickly thru the trees for a few seconds before nearly instantly flying above my truck, at which point i got out of my truck and ran inside terrified before i went all the way inside i poked my head out of the garage again and it had moved behind my house and switch the direction in which it was moving 90 degrees. then i proceeded to run inside my house and get my mom to come outside, by the time we walked outside  it had moved a good distance and we watched it and noticed that it had a slight wobble to it when it moved and after a few seconds of it flying slowly it stopped, moved again for a second, stopped then started moving again and got bright and slowly dissapeared until no longer visible. the way it dissapeared reminded me of a candle slowly burning out. about 2 hours later my girlfriend and i were standing outside talking about the event, and then happened to look over to the original position i saw it pointing, and when sure enough it was there again, exactly the same as i saw it before she saw it and became scared but it only lasted about 3 seconds before it dimmed out and dissapeared exactly the way it had before. the object made no noise at all, flew slowly at times but changed direction and flew extremly fast at times. ive ruled out it being a satillite because of the way it moved and its visual intesity, also the speed in which it flew horizion to horizion and the fact it dims until dissapearing rule that out. ive never seen an airplane fly the way it did, and living on an air base most of my life have never been so scared of something in the air. each time i saw the object i was terrified and had an intese feeling of being followed, had an intese feeling of wanting to run.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A bright white light moving erraticly

content.detailedDescription:
it was may 1st after 5am, sunday morning and i was on my way home.  i was driving on the highway and started looking up at the sky and all of a sudden i noticed a red ball of light. i wasnt sure what it was, i thought i was crazy, then out of the corner of my eye about 50 feet away from it was a circle, saucer like object with four different colored lights underneath. one yellow, one green, one blue, one red. 
  i knew it couldnt be life flight, they only have two lights close together and are not shaped like circles. neither are regular planes.  as soon as i had seen it i just watched in amazement, not to mention i was driving and almost went off the road from gazeing on this flying thing in the sky. i had never felt so excited and so frightened in all my life. i couldn't believe what i was seeing! i kept driving and looking at it as much as i could but lost sight of it over the moutains.
content.summary: Circle with 4 lights on the bottom in the shape of a square,1 yellow,1 green,1blue,1red

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south down gratiot ave. when we saw the object. as we were right in front of bill's suburban which is between 13 mile road and common my husdand noticed something strange. he looked up and said "what the hell is that?" i looked up and saw this object as it was hovering over our vehicle. i watched it float up and up. it looked to me as if it were a white plastic bag with a flame inside. but if it were a plastic bag, the flame would have melted the bag. and if it were a flame inside, it was not flickering as a flame should. i kept watching it to see where it was going and to see what the heck it was. all of sudden it picked up speed and floated higher and higher until it disappeared. we were terrified and it made the hair on our arms stand up on end. i wish i would have gotten a picture of it but it happened so fast.
content.summary: White dome with fire ball inside.

content.detailedDescription:
December,2010 to april,2011

i was in my back yard looking at the stars rite above the mountains and i noticed one sparkling.I thought the light was a very far off plane or chopper until it went up as far up as it did. it moved very slowly straight up, it caught my attention. i then saw another sparkling light in the same area as the first do the same thing. the lights were very far away and the light from them was very faint. i was not sure what they were so i went and grabbed my daughters camera. i started taking video and snapshots, and until 4/28/11 i really did not know how to work the camera. i caught some pretty interesting photos.
 
you tell me what these are!
   i
content.summary: Noticed moving star and took photos

content.detailedDescription: On february 14th i left my daughter,s house at around 4:35 am to go home to coos bay, oregon.  i had chosen to spend the night so that i would not have to drive on route 26 in the dark.  its very curvy and i hate driving at  night.  thinking that by the time i got to  veneta it would be starting  to get light out.  route 26 from veneta to mapleton is also a 'dead zone' for cell phones.  by the time i got to  veneta it was very dark out with patchy clouds.  i continued toward noti and it wasn't getting light at all.  there was no traffic at all at this time and it was very quiet.  i hate driving at night and found that i was driving at 40 to 40 mph hour as it was very dark.  i remember entering walton and pulling over at the walton store to let a log truck pass.   only to find out that within 100 feet he turned right onto nelson mtn rd. i looked at my car clock and saw that it was 5:30 am.  i thought to myself that i bet everyone in walton has been abducted at least twice and laughed.  i drove for about a couple of minutes  when for some reason looked left and saw a large black triangle with 3 white lights on  each end.  i've seen triangles before but this one in addition to the 3 white  lights  there was an extra red light several feet ahead of the lead white light on the triangle.  i didn't stop as it was still dark and i didn't know of any place to pull over.  this triangle  followed along beside me at the same speed making no noise at all.  it was traveling above pastured areas several feet from the road and homes.  i remember thinking that i couldn't believe that it was so close to me and close to homes along the road. the only place i thought to pull over  was in someone's  driveway which would be awkward and not knowing what it was or what it wanted continued driving.  i had to be at work in coos bay by 7:30 am. considering i was driving about 40 mph through walton the triangle followed along  with me for about 5 minutes. i  thought to myself that i would love to chat but i had to hurry home.  at that moment the triangle's back two lights started to glow very brightly.  i got a little worried.  the triangle started to slowly rise in the sky as i continued driving.  the triangle got to a certain height then banked slightly to the left into a canyon when the red light at the end turned on and lit up an entire canyon in a bright white light.  it was so bright i was actually scared for a moment as i have never seen anything that powerful.  the triangle then slowly entered the canyon with that blinding light.  i continued on my way as it started to downpour.  i did not pass  any cars or see anyone on the road. it rained all the way to mapleton where no one was there.  i pulled over and called my daughter in eugene as i knew i had cell service now.  i was so shook up that she thought at first i had hit someone. i continued  to florence where i stopped in safeway and actually saw people!  two days later i saw two black  ops helicopters at the airport as i work near there.   considering this isn't the first time i've seen a triangle  i can only wonder why they don't seem to be to bothered by me seeing them and this concerns me. i now carry a camera and binoculars in my car for the next time.
content.summary: Triangle followed along side my car on route 26

content.detailedDescription: Me my husband and my daughter wer driving home on old 231 heading toward mccution high school in lafayette indiana and we were about to make a left turn into our neighborhood when all of a sudden we both saw to or right way up in the sky a a veryyyy bright greenish glowing ball falling towards the eath. as it was happening both me and my husband just kept saying omg!Omg! it scared both of us very bad but was also exciting.Instead on stoping and turning at our road to our neighborhood we decided to keep going down the road to see if we could see it again because it had went behind the treeline. we drove up the road to a clear spot and stoped on the side of the road to see if it would show up again.It never showed up again though.We ended up going bach home and the whole rest of the night i kept getting goosebumps.This happened at exactly 11:30pm.
content.summary: Bright greenish fire ball falling from sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch around 10:10 pm on 4/1/2011 when i was looking up and saw a bright orange red object moving at a very rapid rate of speed coming over the trees toward my house. at first i thought it was a falling star but quickly realized it was something else. i got up and witnessed this object travel toward me and then a light flashed on the object and it dimmed and i could see a solid object against the bright night sky with no sound what so ever and i watched it until it dissapeared from view about 10 to 15 seconds. my mind was racing at what i had just seen and i sat down and looked up and saw two more coming in the same direction toward me and they were traveling one behind the other at the same rate of speed as before, they were the same shape and color as the one before. i ran down in the yard and watched them dim and again i could see the solid round ojects in the sky. i watched them travel away from me heading toward the ocean until they went out of view. i made a point to listen very intensely and they made not a whisper of sound.  

when i am outside, i am looking up at the sky. i have seen many amazing shooting stars, satalites traveling across the sky but in all my fifty one years i have never seen anything like this before. my heart was racing and i called every member of my family and told them. i called the police and sheriff deptarments and reported the sightings. my neighbor was walking his dog at the time and saw two of the objects as well. we discussed them in detail the next day.

they sky was clear and brightly lit with stars. no moon was in the sky. the objects traveled almost between orion and the big dipper heading northeast in direction.
content.summary: Three orange-red ufo's traveled over my home in sc.

content.detailedDescription:
I was parking the car in front of a friend's house when she pointed to the sky and said "hey, look at those lights."  i looked where she was pointing and saw a group of red non-blinking lights flying towards the southeast.  the initial group had approximately 8-12 lights.  they were flying in formation maintaining a constant altitude and were equidistant from each other.  they were in a triangular relationship to each other as well.

we tried to shoot footage with our cell phones but nothing was showing up on the screen other than the streetlights, etc.  we got out of the car and continued watching more lights coming into view.  is was smaller numbers after the first group containing anywhere from 2-6 lights.  

i called a friend in the same town at 9:32 pm and told her to look at the sky in the east and she saw the same lights.  she alerted her neighbors and they saw the lights as well.  we continued watching more going by all on the same flight path.  there was no sound whatsoever.  they were moving too slowly to be planes.

i am not sure how we lost sight of the objects.  we just kept getting excited and watching the new ones.  it seemed that with the last group they just flew to far to see.  i still have the video on my phone and might try to lighten the exposure to see if there is anything visible.
content.summary: Abilene

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing about an event that i can remember parts of but i think nobody else remembers or m.I.B paid a visit and said not to remember.

i think i was around 12 years old and was visiting my grandparents in the summer on a sunday..... i still live in the area where it took place too so the memory of what i can remember is clear.  we were sitting around talking and suddenly i remember hearing a sonic boom, at the time (1990) nobody knew what a sonic boom was so we all ran outside to see a u.F.O hovering over a building across the street, my friend and i were told to stay inside but ran out anyway.  the next thing i remember was my friend was gone already and i was being lifted off the ground and taken into the craft at that time i grabbed a branch and was holding on to prevent being taken, i remember looking down and seeing my grandmother with a knife or something trying to rescue me and then the cops and fire showed up and i was just out of reach.... the next thing i remember is standing next to my friend and we were both naked looking out a big window and next to us was a gray big eye alien as described on t.V. by hundreds of people.  they used telepathic communication to tell me that i was a special person and their intent seemed to be that of piece and we were looking down at the earth as they said this.  the next thing i only just now remembered is that they may have put a long needle in my head just under my nose above my lip deep into my head but not sure as memories keep coming up over the years.  after that i remember being on the ground again and hearing another sonic boom to turn around and see 3 lights far off in the distance, in the shape of a triangle, red green and blue.  we ran into the house and at the time only remembered hearing the first sonic boom running out and looking up after hearing the second and when we ran back in my family said we were gone a long time (a few hours) and they had to call the police.  i never saw the police after i came back in the house but later i do remember them being there during the event.  i asked my family about it years later and they just look away or say they don't remember but it seems like they may not be telling me the truth.... years later i was in my 20's and this is a little bit funny but true, i was in bed and had just bought a cardboard standie that day at a collectors shop and it was nelix on star trek voyager...... that night as i slept i woke up scared and frozen, my arms felt like i had handcuffs on and my legs were also feeling that way but i could not see anything and could not move.... i was on my side in the fetal position and facing the wall, i turned my head just enough that i could see behind me out of the corner of my eye and i could see the standie almost in the middle of the room but moving near me and as it got closer it would stop and a gray big eye head would pop out from behind it as if to see how close it was and when it was right near me the next thing i remember it was morning again.   i know this sounds like a bugs bunny cartoon with someone sneaking up to someone else with a fake bush or whatever but it's true as i remember it.  one more thing.... as some people have burn marks or evidence of some sort i as well have something that i think may have been a result of visiting them.  i now have physic powers they may have made me physic... no bullshit, i have dreams that later come true, i also found some videos online about remote viewing and can do that well.  i have also made predictions and have seen things in my mind that i think may be going on at area 51.  i need help from someone who will not think i am crazy i am ready to tell my story.  i wrote to you before about 5 boys who each have 5 fathers on a desert road and sent you a generated picture of what i once saw.  this is the tip of the iceberg, you can contact me for more info...... if you want to.
content.summary: U.F.O hovering above house and abduction

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the weather channel the other day watching videos of the tuscaloosa tornado in alabama that occured this past week.  on one video titled "tuscaloosa tornado". i downloaded it to my hard drive and when playing it back i noticed some orbs at the bigging of the the film and some strange red lights in the sky at the end. they last only about a second.

 this may of course be debris flying around but it doesn't look like debris to me.  i captured 2 images from the video. one shows the 3 orbs in a triangle pattern and the other which is at the end of the film shows what appears to be red or pink light or lights. perhaps this is the sun trying to come thru but it looks strange. 

  anyway check it out for yourselves.

     steve
content.summary: Tuscaloosa tornado appears to have orbs in it.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of wednesday, april 13th, 2011, at several minutes after 7pm, i left a friend���s home in taylor, near the crossing of telegraph rd. and van born st.  it did not take me long to get back to the highway from her house, after only a very short trip on main roads, a quick gas fill-up at the pump using my card, and then a lengthy stop at a red light, which i suspect puts the sighting at around 7:10 to 7:20 when it began, and lasted for approximately 20-25 minutes in full, though it was not completely visible for me that entire time.

i drive a 1997 pontiac sunfire, and my sketches include features from my perspective while sitting in my vehicle.  i was driving alone with a cell phone which was packed away in a bag in my passenger seat ��� and because my dashboard clock does not work, i was unsure of the exact time.  i have no camera phone or other recording device, so i had to document and sketch it from memory.  to my knowledge, there were no other witnesses, although other people were driving on the same road and able to see the same thing, though none seemed to notice.

on eastbound i-94 in metro detroit, near the southfield highway intersection, while the interstate is significantly above ground level enough to see the object hovering near the horizon, i caught sight of what i first believed was a banner of some sort, like those trailing behind airplanes (aerial advertising).  then i realized that this object���s relative position to me and lack of motion meant that there was no plane tugging a banner along, and i surely couldn���t spot a plane of any form near the object.  as i continued to drive, i had to fight with looking over or past other obstacles to my vision while still driving at high speeds during traffic ��� i did well with this, and there was luckily no danger involved during this period of time.  as i think back on it, i only wish i would have had the foresight to pull off the interstate to a main road where the object was still visible, and to watch it as long as i could ��� however, i never came to the conclusion that i was the only eyewitness to this object, and surely i would see some news of it when i arrived home.  if i had the chance again, i would watch it until it left my sight on its own.

as i got better and better glances at the object, i continued to move along the highway, making my way for i-75, my ultimate route back home.  at one point, i was angled so that it was visible in my passenger-side window in my direct view, with no obstacles, and showing me clearly that it was not attached to anything, and it was unlike anything i had previously seen or ever heard about here on earth.  though i was clearly astonished at the sight of it, i was intent on getting back home, and though i was continuously debunking my own skeptical ideas of what earthly craft this could be, i was instinctively sure that someone somewhere was getting press coverage of this event at that very moment, and i should get home and watch the news on tv and the net.  later, when i arrived home, i learned there was no news, no sightings on the tv or internet, and wished i would have taken action then.

because i have seen tethered balloons used as advertising, i even thought maybe it could be something like that, but the better glances i got, the more and more skeptical of my own skepticism i became.

having the object in my sights at several points on i-94, i wasn���t quite sure of where it was, or how far away it was, and therefore ��� how large the object might have been.  it was very difficult to discern its exact size and location, and only after looking at a google map of the area was i able to determine approximately where it could have been located.  based on those figures, i would guess the craft could have been anywhere from 300 feet to a mile or more in width, and about one-quarter that in height.  if i had ever seen a rectangular blimp (an object that could hover for extended periods of time, such as this object did), i would believe this could be a blimp, but the whole concept of a rectangular aerial craft defies the use of aerodynamics used in the craft���s design in order to adequately fly the thing around during an event ��� this object was clearly rectangular or perhaps even more of a parallelogram, but it had relatively angular and obvious corners, with two pairs of parallel sides.  when i first spotted the object, i could have sworn it was angled diagonally, making me think it was a banner being pulled by an airplane, though it could have been the curvature of my windshield, since i was looking between the windshield and the passenger-side window, leaning back and forward, ducking my head down and then trying to peer over ��� all because it was positioned somewhat behind the car frame bar between those two windows, giving me a pretty precise angle of my first sighting of it, as well as future angles.

after i merged on to northbound i-75, i could see the object still in my rear-view and side mirrors, though my curving driving motion made it difficult to keep in my sight at all times.  then, while on a straight path on the interstate, i got a very clear sighting of it in my rear-view mirror, as well as my side mirror, both separately for several seconds, enough to pinpoint a general location relative to my own position.  i have included drawings of these perspectives in my report, showing the object as it was situated in my view in both mirrors.

it was still rather bright daylight outside, with the low sun nearly set, and making the colors of the sky begin to be more vibrant, giving off rosy pink tones and yellow hued light on most things reflecting it.  there were no stars visible yet, and the sky was not really dark enough for them in any location.  there were few clouds, and the ones present were very far away and thin, not having much mass or density.  no other objects appeared as solid and obvious as this one.  i could see no earthly craft, such as planes, helicopters, or jets.  when i first glimpsed the object it was positioned in a location where it was made somewhat darker, appearing as a muted magenta or deep reddish mauve, and by the time it was positioned clearly in my window it had brightened because of the sun���s light, falling on it and the rest of the horizon.

in my side window is where i caught the best glimpse of the object, and is the view i remembered when making my color renditions.  i mostly remember how the light reflected off it: it was solid, a different color than the sky, and reflected the colors of the sunset and sky, though not as if it were ���shiny��� so much as it was solid and had mass that caught the unique sky colors.  it did not seem to have any writings, markings, or other significant or relevant identifiers, and it not produce light, phenomena, or effects such as that.  i cannot be sure if it was silent or audible, since i was driving in a car.

in full, the sites where/when the object was visible were around the southfield highway/i-94 intersection, for several miles, and then it was no longer visible because of the elevation of the highway for a large portion of the remaining distance to i-75.  however, it began to be visible again as i could overlook the city of detroit from the ramp between i-94 e and i-75 n.  by the time i was heading north on i-75, it was visible in my mirrors.  i have attached a map that i got using google maps and adding in where i was located when i spotted the object.  though i placed myself after southfield highway on my trip when i first spotted it, when i took another trip on the same route to be sure of my sighting locations, i realized that it may have been before i passed this intersection that i remember being one of my landmarks.  after driving on i-75 for some distance, i was considering getting off the highway and parking somewhere i might be able to view the object, but by that time i had a difficult time trying to see it, and figured it best to simply make it home and watch the news.  that was about 1-2 miles before the davison freeway (m-8, i believe), ending my active sighting.  i never stayed to see what the craft did, where it went, etc.  i now wish i would have parked to stay and watch it as adamantly as i did while driving on the road.

the object did not seem to move, or moved incredibly slowly as if hovering, and though i could not be sure of its absolute motion or stillness due to my own driving motion, i can easily say that it did not change locations much based on the angles at which i could view it ��� it must have been hovering or moving incredibly slowly for an extended period of time, and no airplane could have done what it did.  as shown in one of my sketches, i broke down to myself why it could not be an airplane (with a banner or without), a simple helicopter, a military helicopter, or simple blimp, and was left with no options to my knowledge.  after extensive discussion with others as to what i could have been witnessing, the discussions have only proven to show me more ways in which the object that i witnessed was operating and was constructed unlike anything known to myself or the general public.  if it���s man-made, it isn���t publicly accessible.

a friend of mine suggested that perhaps it was a harrier jet (sp?) because they are capable of flying in one relative position for a short period, however another friend of mine who was in the us army in iraq for three years said that that kind of jet would never hang out in one position for as long as i described, and would use a lot of fuel just to do that, while also making a loud noise that i would have heard even over my vehicle���s engine.  lastly, though a jet is angular, this object did not have enough angles to make it a jet ��� only four angles, and they were simple corners.  another friend supported my blimp theory by saying that that evening was the first night of the red wings play-offs, and could have been a blimp used to record the area from an aerial view.

i waited to write this report in order to do some decent sketches and digital renditions of what i witnessed.  having finished them but still seeing no coverage of the object on local media, i was about to give up my urges to report it and move on to other issues in life.  then i saw this article (link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) which described an object spotted in texas that sounded as if it appeared similar to what i saw here in my own state.  after realizing that this thing may have made a re-appearance elsewhere, i knew i had to reveal my sighting to the world the right way.
content.summary: Rectangular solid object over downtown detroit the first night of the red wings play-offs.

content.detailedDescription:
I am over at my gfs place and about 45 mins ago (2:40 am), i saw an object streak across the sky that kind of looked like a meteor. i lost sight of it when it went "behind" me and the carport blocked it from my sight. it looked like an object that had a tail of light behind it. the front looked like a yellow/white hot object kinda "baseball" shape. it may be a meteor. i figure i may as well report this thing i saw, so it can be looked into. it happened at this address: *(address removed--cms/sg).   
   i was facing south smokin a cig before bed and i looked up and saw an object streaking from north to south. when i was lookin south, the object was a little to the right of me. i had to turn my head slightly to the right and up a little to see it. in other words, it was on my right side but obviously in the sky. i believe it was to the west of me.
content.summary: Ufo or meteor?

content.detailedDescription:
Viewing this photograph found at: *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) my attention was drawn to some people in the crowd. their attention should have been drawn to the prince william and the duchess of cambridge but some seem to be taking photos/filming obviously away and up from the location of the prince and duchess. not a normal behavior considering the event and the proximity of the carriages to these people. what are they witnessing? wedding crashers??

zoom in to where the prince is at, then scan to the right area and look at the crowd.   many aren't looking in the direction of the prince and duchess but obviously something else has their attention and their gaze had me searching above the tree line and i saw an anomalie and looking further found 2 more anomalies.

the darker of the three seem disc shape but it could well be a fighter type plane on an angle, however, the problem i have with the plane is i doubt any would be permitted to fly during the horse drawn carriages, especially not a jet engine.   

given the distance, could they be birds? it seems unlikely to me but perhaps not impossible?  in need of further investigation! film footage analysis of this time frame and hopefully able to come to a definate conclusion on what these are by the mufon investigators; hence my post.

someone actually expected ufos to be present at the wedding, if they are ufos, perhaps they were not unexpected guests afterall according to this:
**(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Ufos, royal wedding crashers!? bbc news hd photograph  *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling west on harpertown rd. past davis and elkins college in elkins,wv when i saw a bright red/orange object hovering above the hill to the left of the road.  i then noticed it cross the road above and in front of me from left to right.  the object was round, and about a half and inch in diameter between my finger and thumb at arms length.   i pulled over at mcquain rd on the right (a small dirt road).  as soon as i was off of the road i looked back up and saw 2 objects traveling north/east right above me.  then, one after another, three more started dropping out of the clouds behind the first two.  they all traveled over the hill at the same altitude until they were out of my viewing area.  they traveled fairly slowly from my point of view and made no sound.
as soon as i got back into the car, i called 911 to report.  i gave them all of the info while i was still watching a couple of them when i rounded to next turn at the top of the hill.
i then picked up my girlfriend at the end of harpertown rd., traveled back east and she saw one that was still in the distance.  we stopped the car, got out and watched as it hovered from right to left across the sky and then upwards into the sky.
by the way... that was the only patch of clouds that night.  the rest of the sky was very clear and the stars were very bright.
we traveled to the top of a hill not too far away where we could see the horizon good to see if we could find them again.  on our way, i thought that i saw a massive triangle in the distance, but i can not confidently trust myself on that object because it was too fast to be reliable.  
we didn't see them again, but there was a massive amount of air traffic right after the sighting.
content.summary: 5 bright round objects drop out of clouds and travel ne.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a group of about 5 friends witnessed a flickering star like object in the southern sky. it moved to the west and passed out of our view. it returned about thirty seconds later still flickering and flying in a very erratic pattern. we tried to pass it off as a loose kite, or a high flying bird. it began flying towards us then and we realized that it was very high up in the sky as it flew behind a cloud never to be seen again.
content.summary: Flickering, erratic, "star-like" object.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching what looked like a airplane but it had no flickering light,it got brilant white and very bright looked like a dark hole in center then just vanished..Never seen anyhting like that before!!Any idea what it could have been??? it was so bright that it got the attention of a friend sitting on my steps with his back to it. did any stars explode tonight?
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the dog out for the last time for the night. we were on the side of my apartment building. i was only outside for maybe five or ten minutes. i noticed it at first because it was very bright in the sky even though some front porn lights were in my eyes. at first, i thought it was a planet, but it was too bright. it stayed in the same position the whole time i observed it. first, the light was steady, then it started to twinkled like a star, then it got brighter. it was yellow-orange in color. then it seemed to "phase" in and out, not like a twinkle, more the whole image came and went. then it got bright for the last time and disappeared. the whole thing lasted three minutes at the most. i kept my gaze in that direction the whole time. i did not, however, see it appear to begin with, so i don't know how long it was there before i got there. 
how did i feel? i was in awe. and a bit shocked. i don't know of anything that could do that. certainly wasn't an airplane or a satellite, couldn't be a star or a planet, so what could it be?
content.summary: Orange light twinkling due south. maybe45 degrees from the horizon. two to three times brighter than the brightest star. phased in and out several times before it disappeared entirely.

content.detailedDescription: I'd just submitted a report of a ufo in ct, the video is located on facebook at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Video of report submitted

content.detailedDescription:
I'm submitting this for an uneasy friend who wants to know what's going on. his son said he saw "a rocket" at about 6:30 pm. he was driving and unable to look, though. about 15 minutes ago now, my friend was sitting in his hot tub outside and here is his description word for word:

"ok. there is very strange aerial activity over fairfield, ct right now. tons of quiet objects in the air. i am actually a little freaked out. i was outside in the hot tub and feeling very paranoid. i was seeing several lights across the sky, almost like airplane lights or shooting stars, but it wasn't either of those."

he is sending me a video as we speak, i'll pass it along as soon as i can get it uploaded.
content.summary: Several silent arial objects in air right now
